name: NSTextFinderBarContainer
desc: A protocol that provides a container in which the find bar is displayed.

items.name: var findBarView: NSView?
items.desc: The view assigned by the text bar as the find bar view for the container.

items.name: func contentView() -> NSView?
items.desc: A view hierarchy that contains all the views which display the contents being searched.

items.name: var isFindBarVisible: Bool
items.desc: Returns whether the container should display its find bar.

items.name: func findBarViewDidChangeHeight()
items.desc: Notifies the find bar container that the find bar has changed its height.
